title: Italic Font ID
author: dsbm223

comments.content: This is probably started as **[Sign Painter (HouseScript)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131741/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=SignPainter%20-%20HouseScript&fid=9468b1802a14f543fd8177dcac8171ae&fsize=60&text=Watch%20me&fit=1)** by House Industries
